weka.distributed.hadoop

Class WekaScoringHadoopJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • distributed.core.DistributedJob
      • weka.distributed.hadoop.HadoopJob
        • weka.distributed.hadoop.WekaScoringHadoopJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, CommandlineRunnable, EnvironmentHandler, OptionHandler

    public class WekaScoringHadoopJob
extends HadoopJob
implements CommandlineRunnable
    Hadoop job for scoring new data using an existing Weka classifier or clusterer.
    Version:
    $Revision: 11837 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
